Chart my health is a digital tool created to improve the assessment and monitoring of physical health tests in patients with mental illness and those with long term physical conditions, enabling the timely identification of patients’ needs and access to evidence-based interventions.

Find out more

Download the app today!

Our app is currently in early release and can be downloaded from the Play Store, IOS users please use the Contact options below and we will provide details of how to get involved

Our Story

JS Bamrah, CBE FRCPsych, tells the story behind Chart my health...

Patients

People experiencing mental illness are confronted with a higher risk of poor physical health which necessitates consistent and integrated screening of their physical health symptoms to reduce and prevent morbidity

Trends

Capture, chart and identify the trends of your physical health

Improve Awareness

Improve your own awareness to take control of your physical health

Shared Decision Making

Use the application to support shared decision-making and informed management of your physical health

Open Source

Designed by patients, the application is open source, you can use it and tell us how to improve it in the future

Clinicians

Functioning within a digital healthcare ecosystem that aims to transform healthcare through technological innovation, the Chart my health app treats the patient as a full partner whilst providing you with regulated ongoing access to the patient’s self-documented data records.

Trends

Capture, chart and identify trends in multiple dimensions of your patients’ physical health

Improve Awareness

Improve patient awareness and empower them to take control of their physical health

Shared Decision Making

A platform supporting shared decision-making and informed management of physical health

Open Source

Our product is Open Source, designed by clinicians and patients to improve outcomes
